sub_title: Global Category Director - Pest at RB
summary:
Global executive with proven leadership skills across North America, Europe and Asia in managing regional P&L’s, steering business restructuring, integrating acquisitions, leading in  start-up environments, developing country entry strategies, building customer engagement, modeling country specific retail-centric marketing strategies to grow market share, driving innovative solutions to compound global revenue growth and strengthen brand shares.	

- ORGANIZATIONAL RESTRUCTURE: Led the transition and restructure of SCJ businesses to create a new Indochina Cluster reporting directly to the President/COO – Indochina Cluster, Malaysia 2014/15   

- REVENUE GROWTH: Received best subsidiary award for sales/profitability across all  International Markets for three consecutive years – Thailand, Myanmar, Cambodia,  Laos, ASEAN Cluster 2010-13

- INTERNATIONAL EXPANSION: Mapped and deployed business model to enter Myanmar and expand distributor businesses in Vietnam, Myanmar, Cambodia, Laos – ASEAN Cluster 2013

- CUSTOMER ENGAGEMENT: As Category Sales Business Leader for SCJ-Walmart achieved exclusivity for Ziploc brand at Walmart—first time and first category to achieve this at SCJ - Bentonville, Arkansas 2010

- CUSTOMER ENGAGEMENT: As Category Sales Business Leader for SCJ-Walmart received best supplier award for Home Storage business from Walmart – Bentonville, Arkansas 2009

- ACQUISITION INTEGRATION: Deployed to India to establish/lead new acquisition into SCJ structures and establish a Marketing Dept – New Delhi, India 2005

- MARKETING STRATEGY: In various Global Marketing roles redefined category strategies, led successful brand innovation launches in US, South America, Europe, and Asia, grew global shares, and received President’s Award – Racine, Wisconsin 2005

- SOCIAL ENTREPRENEUR: Co-founded “Innovative Minds School” for under privileged children in India with a focus on creative learning, sports and sustainability www.InnovativeMindsSchool.org  Nagpur, India

- On gaining Vietnam responsibility strategically reversed an aggressive decline (-30%) to end the year at a +3% growth

- Achieved best in Asia share results for Thailand despite market contraction, segment declines, and aggressive competitive environment 

- Continued to expand distribution in all markets and gained better than budgeted category captaincies in both Thailand and Vietnam

- Reported to President/COO in the absence of Asia leadership while establishing the new Indochina Cluster', 'title': 'General Manager - Indochina', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'SC Johnson', 'description': '- Exceeded Budget FY14, FY13, FY12, FY11 and delivered double digit growth across all key financial variables of NS, OP, and NOE

-  Accelerated Emerging Market growth to +15% for two consecutive years vs the previous average of +5.9% 

- Improved 2012 and 2011 GEOS (Employee Opinion) scores across all attributes (1st time in the past 5 years) by initiating a detailed plan of activities to motivate and address employee concerns

- Chartered Myanmar strategic entry plans which exceeded budget expectations', 'title': 'General Manager - Thailand & Emerging Markets', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Bentonville, Arkansas, USA', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'company': 'SC Johnson', 'description': '- Exceeded FY11, FY10, FY09 sales budget with efficient reduction in deals spend

- Developed and executed the best Holiday program on sales as well as sell through for Walmart – Dec 2009

- Exceeded 2008/2009 sales targets for Home Storage at Walmart (+9.87% vs YA)', 'title': 'Senior Sales Manager - Walmart Team', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'New Delhi, India', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}}, 'company': 'SC Johnson', 'description': '- Part of two person team from SC Johnson deployed to integrate an acquisition to SC Johnson processes  

- Part of the Management Committee responsible for P&L, managing/developing base business portfolio, recommending blue print and strategy for new category introductions, and defining 5 year plans for broad basing the business

- Responsible for establishing a marketing department in a sales-only organizational structure, introducing SCJ marketing processes, and implementing forecasting and planning systems 

- Conceived, recommended, and implemented a strategic dual brand strategy for Pest Control business to combat competitive forces while balancing internal risk, cannibalization and profitability with a focus on entering key growth segments,  increasing consumer usage frequency, enhancing shelf presence and reinforcing brand positioning--resulted in a reversal of an inherited 3 year share decline and achieved sales volume growth year on year

- Recommended the strategic entry into Cleaners segment to establish a strong second pillar to the SCJ business, launched Mr Muscle which became #2 brand in the market in less than a year

- Recommended blue print for Air Care entry plans for Glade in India by FY10', 'title': 'Marketing Director', 'employment_type': None}]}]
